sourcesContent:
Manage commitments

You can create new commitments here.

Create new commitment Select template {{t.Title}} Input Input Input import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { CommitmentTemplate } from '../interfaces'; @Component({ selector: 'app-manage-commitments', templateUrl: './manage-commitments.component.html', styleUrls: ['./manage-commitments.css'] }) export class ManageCommitmentsComponent { public templates: CommitmentTemplate[] = []; public selectedTemplate: CommitmentTemplate; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'templates').subscribe(result => { this.templates = result; }, error => console.error(error)); this.selectedTemplate = this.templates[0]; } }
